data.title: Around the Association: 2010 NBA Draft Previews - Remaining teams' possible draft needs
data.meta_description: Around the Association: 2010 NBA Draft Previews - Remaining teams' possible draft needs, rosters for analysis. Memphis Grizzlies, New Orleans Hornets, Indiana Pacers, Utah Jazz, LA Clippers, Detroit Pistons, Sacramento Kings, Minnesota Timberwolves, New Jersey Nets, Philadelphia 76ers, Washington Wizards.
data.text:
I did my best. Not good enough! Didn't complete my ambitious plan of 30 draft previews in 30 days.

But alas, I am sitting here live at media row at the 2010 NBA Draft inside Madison Square Garden. Follow me on Twitter at @poormanscommish or on Facebook at http://facebook.com/dreamleague.

The crux behind trying to analyze the draft needs of each team, particularly those after the Lottery picks, which may not be as clear-cut "best player available", were the salaries committed at each position. Thank you, HoopsHype.

My hope is that this will help you as you watch the Draft.

Here's a compilation of the remaining teams, from the 12th pick (Memphis Grizzlies) to the 1st pick (Washington Wizards). I left out our Golden State Warriors because I'm sure you guys are well-versed and immersed in our roster (troubles) already...

DISCLAIMER: There very well could be mistakes. I compiled these on the plane and am hastily copying/pasting into this blog entry. Only 4 hours to go!

Memphis Grizzlies

...have the 12th, 25th, and 28th picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Mike Conley Marcus Williams sg O.J. Mayo Ronnie Brewer Lester Hudson sf Rudy Gay Darrell Arthur Sam Young DeMarre Carroll pf Zach Randolph c Hasheem Thabeet Marc Gasol Hamed Haddadi

Knee-jerk reaction: Why the heck do they have so many centers?!

New Orleans Hornets

...have the 11th pick only.

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Chris Paul Darren Collison sg Morris Peterson Peja Stojakovic Marcus Thornton sf David West James Posey pf Darius Songaila Julian Wright Ike Diogu Sean Marks c Emeka Okafor Aaron Gray

Indiana Pacers

...have the 10th, 40th, and 57th picks.

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg TJ Ford Earl Watson A.J. Price sg Dahntay Jones Brandon Rush Luther Head sf Danny Granger Mike Dunleavy pf Troy Murphy Tyler Hansbrough Josh McRoberts c Jeff Foster Roy Hibbert Solomon Jones

Utah Jazz

...have the 9th and 55th picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Deron Williams Ronnie Price sg Kyle Korver Wesley Matthews Sundiata Gaines Othyus Jeffers sf Andrei Kirilenko C.J. Miles pf Carlos Boozer Paul Millsap c Mehmet Okur Kosta Koufos Kyrylo Fesenko

LA Clippers

...have the 8th and 54th picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Baron Davis Steve Blake Bobby Brown sg Eric Gordon Rasual Butler sf Travis Outlaw Mardy Collins Brian Skinner Steve Novak pf Blake Griffin Drew Gooden Craig Smith c Chris Kaman DeAndre Jordan

Detroit Pistons

...have the 7th and 36th picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Rodney Stuckey Chucky Atkins Will Bynum sg Richard Hamilon/td> Ben Gordon sf Tayshaun Prince Austin Daye Jonas Jerebko pf Charlie Villanueva Jason Maxiell Chris Wilcox Ben Wallace DaJuan Summers c Kwame Brown

Sacramento Kings

...have the 5th and 33rd picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Tyreke Evans Beno Udrih Francisco Garcia sg sf Donte Green Omri Casspi Dominic McGuire Ime Udoka pf Carl Landry Jon Brockman Sean May c Samuel Dalembert Jason Thompson

Minnesota Timberwolves

...have the 4th, 16th, 23rd, 45th, and 56th picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Jonny Flynn Ramon Sessions sg Wayne Ellington sf Corey Brewer Ryan Gomes Damien Wilkins pf Al Jefferson Kevin Love Brian Cardinal Oleksiy Pecherov c Ryan Hollins Nathan Jawai Darko Milicic

New Jersey Nets

...have the 3rd, 27th, and 31st picks

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Devin Harris Chris Quinn sg Courtney Lee Keyon Dooling sf Terrence Williams Bobby Simmons Jarvis Hayes Trenton Hassell pf Yi Jianlian Kris Humphries c Brook Lopez Josh Boone Tony Battie

Philadelphia 76ers

...have the 2nd pick only

COMMITTED MAYBE OUT? pg Louis Williams Jrue Holiday sg Jason Kapono Willie Green Jodie Meeks sf Andre Iguodala Andres Nocioni Thaddeus Young Rodney Carney pf Elton Brand Jason Smith c Spencer Hawes Marreese Speights Francisco Elson

Washington Wizards

...have the 1st, 30th, and 35th picks
